mapper.select: SELECT TBL.EMP_ID, TBL.EMP_SABUN, TBL.EMP_PWD, TBL.EMP_NAME, TBL.EMP_DEPT, TBL.EMP_GRADE, TBL.EMP_BIRTH, TBL.EMP_PHONE, TBL.EMP_ADDR, TBL.EMP_ZIPCODE, TBL.EMP_DETAIL_ADDR, TBL.EMP_EMAIL, TBL.EMP_STATUS, TBL.EMP_FIRST_DT, TBL.EMP_LAST_DT, TBL.EMP_VAC -- , -- TR.ROLE_NAME FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE TBL -- INNER JOIN TBL_USER_ROLE TUR -- ON TBL.EMP_ID = TUR.EMP_ID -- INNER JOIN TBL_ROLE TR -- ON TUR.ROLE_ID = TR.ROLE_ID WHERE EMP_SABUN = #{empSabun};
SELECT TR.ROLE_NAME FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE TBL INNER JOIN TBL_USER_ROLE TUR ON TBL.EMP_ID = TUR.EMP_ID INNER JOIN TBL_ROLE TR ON TUR.ROLE_ID = TR.ROLE_ID WHERE TBL.EMP_SABUN = #{empSabun};
select NEW_GRADE from TBL_NEW_EMPLOYEE where NEW_ID = #{newId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NEW_EMPLOYEE (NEW_NAME, NEW_PHONE, NEW_ADDR, NEW_ZIPCODE, NEW_DETAIL_ADDR, NEW_EMAIL, NEW_DEPT, NEW_BIRTH, NEW_GRADE, NEW_STATUS) VALUES (#{newName}, #{newPhone}, #{newAddr}, #{newZipcode}, #{newDetailAddr}, #{newEmail}, #{newDept}, #{newBirth}, #{newGrade}, 'ACTIVE')
mapper.select: SELECT TNE.NEW_ID, TNE.NEW_NAME, TNE.NEW_PHONE, TNE.NEW_ADDR, TNE.NEW_EMAIL, TNE.NEW_DEPT, TNE.NEW_BIRTH, TNE.NEW_GRADE, TNE.NEW_STATUS FROM TBL_NEW_EMPLOYEE TNE

SELECT TE.EMP_ID, TE.EMP_PHONE, TE.EMP_ADDR, TE.EMP_EMAIL,TE.EMP_SABUN,TE.EMP_BIRTH, TE.EMP_DEPT, TE.EMP_STATUS, TE.EMP_GRADE, TE.EMP_NAME, TE.EMP_FIRST_DT,TE.EMP_VAC, TE.EMP_PROFILE FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE TE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_EMPLOYEE ( EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_PHONE, EMP_ADDR, EMP_ZIPCODE, EMP_DETAIL_ADDR, EMP_EMAIL, EMP_DEPT, EMP_FIRST_DT, EMP_SABUN, EMP_PWD, EMP_BIRTH, EMP_GRADE, EMP_STATUS ) VALUES ( #{empId}, #{empName}, #{empPhone}, #{empAddr}, #{empZipcode}, #{empDetailAddr}, #{empEmail}, #{empDept}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), CONCAT(YEAR(NOW()), LPAD((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(EMP_SABUN), 0) + 1 FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE AS sb), 4, '0')), #{empPwd}, #{empBirth}, #{empGrade}, #{empStatus} )
mapper.select: select EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_PHONE,EMP_EMAIL, EMP_DEPT, EMP_FIRST_DT, EMP_SABUN,EMP_VAC,EMP_PROFILE from TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE MONTH(EMP_FIRST_DT) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(EMP_FIRST_DT) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) order by EMP_FIRST_DT desc;
